= !HintStyle property =

*Project:* [HotLabelComponent Hot Label Component].

*Unit:* _PJHotLabel_.

*Class:* _[TPJHotLabel TPJHotLabel]_

{{{
type
  TPJHLHintStyle = (hsNormal, hsURL, hsCustom);

property HintStyle: TPJHLHintStyle;
}}}

== Description ==

The _!HintStyle_ property determines how the text displayed in the component's pop-up hint is derived. There are three possible sources of the of the hint text:

|| *Style* || *Notes* ||
|| `hsNormal` || The pop-up hint displays as normal - i.e. the hint's text is taken from the _[TPJHotLabelHint Hint]_ property. ||
|| `hsURL` || The pop-up hint displays the _[TPJHotLabelURL URL]_ property value. The _[TPJHotLabelHint Hint]_ property is ignored. ||
|| `hsCustom` || The user can specify a custom hint by handling the _[TPJHotLabelOnCustomHint OnCustomHint]_ event. See the _[TPJHotLabelOnCustomHint OnCustomHint]_ topic for details of how the hint is set in the event handler. If the _[TPJHotLabelOnCustomHint OnCustomHint]_ event is not handled then the hint's text comes from the _[TPJHotLabelHint Hint]_ property as normal. ||

Note that no pop-up hint will display unless hints are enabled. This is done by ensuring the inherited _!ShowHint_ property is `True`.

The default value of _!HintStyle_ is `hsNormal`.
